quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a wrong turn to get you to the right place.

I am not a day dreamer, I am a believer, that after every painful love I have gone through, it is just an experience to crack open the deepest parts of my core and allow to me to delve into a passion so rare, that I will find a love that was almost, never meant to be.
He stirred my soul in the most subtle way and the story between us wrote itself.
Our eyes met and our souls caught on fire.
Do not come into agreement with fear. Activate your faith, live in victory, speak over your life and expect great things to come your way.
Oh it was meant to be. It just wasn't meant to last.

So many people bump into our lives for a second and it changes us forever, but they never know it. And while that's funny and strange and a little sad, it's also just life. And the truth of the matter is, it was never really about them anyway. It was always about us and what we were meant to learn from them. It was always about us and who we were meant to become as a result of having encountered them.
When two people are meant to be together, they will be together. It's fate.
If they were meant to be together they would find a way to do it.
Some things were never meant to be recycled.
We're social animals; we're meant to be together, but we were never necessarily meant to be together without being together. That was never the plan, I don't think.
If two people are meant to be together, nothing can keep them apart.
Sometimes I think things happen for a reason... And I think if we're meant to run into each other again, fate will make it happen.
I know that people change. I thought... I thought we're going to change together. I thought that's what it meant to be in love.
Life is funny...we never know what's in store for us and time brings on what is meant to be.
You may not be where you want to be. But that is where you are meant to be. The only reason why you are here.
We can't go back to who we once were. We can only go on and become the person we were meant to be.
Why does anyone love someone? Some things are just meant to be.
Everything lost is meant to be found. Don't worry.
Sometimes nothing is the best something. If a thing is meant to be sometimes it's best to just let it happen, rather than try to force it.
This is where we're meant to be. I knew we were meant to be together from the first moment that we met.
I don't know what's meant to be. Vincent, I care about you so deeply. But a part of me is unhappy. And we both know why.
I was wrong about you. I think you're a wonderful man. I wish it could've been different between us. I guess it just wasn't meant to be. Sorry.
I pretty much lost everything. And then you show up, and somehow we find you just in time to save her. Maybe it was meant to be.
Let the past die. Kill it if you have to. It's the only way to become who you were meant to be.
It wasn't meant to be. There's nothing to be scared of, it's just a storm.

Caroline... you and I are meant to be together. People will tell you nothing matters, the whole world's about to end soon anyway. Those people are looking at life the wrong way. I mean, things don't need to last forever to be perfect.
I don't understand. We're a team. We're meant to be together. We're destined to do...
Listen these were meant to be a very special gift for someone. Well, if we're meant to meet again, we'll meet again. it's just not the right time now.
If we were meant to be together, we would be together. I just wanted you to be happy. That's all. You did everything. You accepted me for who I am, and not for what you wanted me to be.
